org.phantomapi.chromatic

Class ChromaticHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.chromatic.ChromaticHost

  • public class ChromaticHost
extends Object
    Holds a reference of all chromatic blocks
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChromaticHost()
      Creates a new reference based on the internal mapping or cached in phantom's data folder if it isnt possible to load it internally
